entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 20 this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 40 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 600 metres in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 18 February 2023
